document_data.mainbody:
Telarantra was a War Wizard of Cormyr in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
She was not above gloating when killing innocent people.
One of her spells slew a fellow War Wizard almost immediately by stealing his lifeforce. Another of her spells broke a song dragon free from a magical effect that froze it in time the same effect, or one not long after, caused a fiery explosion at a distance.
Besides being a War Wizard, she worked for the Rightful Conspiracy.
Telarantra was one of the mages that arrived in the aftermath of the song dragon Ammaratha Cyndusks attack on Vangerdahast at his hideout in Mouth oGargoyles in . The song dragon had been stopped with magic that froze it in time as soon as she learned that, Telarantra immediately slew the nearest mage, and unfroze the dragon, unleashing an explosion. She expected the dragon would finish its task of slaying Vangerdahast.
However, Ammaratha Cyndusk chose to turn on her instead of slaying Vangerdahast, and quickly disemboweled her.
